sentences.english: Today we'll sing a song, Jingle Bells.
sentences.chinese: 学唱“铃儿响钉铛”，播放录音让学生跟唱。

sentences.english: Some have even been arrested and imprisoned for crimes committed by their doppelgangers.
sentences.chinese: 有些人甚至因为冒用者所犯下的罪行而𨱍铛入狱。

sentences.english: Suddenly he heard a faint twang .
sentences.chinese: 突然，他听到一下轻微的“铛”声。

definition: to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc)/to say repeatedly/to urge insistently/to ask repeatedly/to stick to a point/(onom.) tinkling or jingling sound
